languages.text: "Но вы держите меня при себе именно потому, что нуждаетесь в моих способностях, шерин. И я могла бы предложить вам больше..."

traits.locale_text: "Но вы держите меня при себе именно потому, что нуждаетесь в моих способностях, шерин. И я могла бы предложить вам больше..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "But you keep me around because you need my capabilities, shereen. And I can offer you more..."
languages.original_text: "Но вы держите меня при себе именно потому, что нуждаетесь в моих способностях, шерин. И я могла бы предложить вам больше..."

traits.locale_text: "But you keep me around because you need my capabilities, shereen. And I can offer you more..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But you keep me around because you need my capabilities, shereen. And I can offer you more..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But you keep me around because you need my capabilities, shereen. And I can offer you more..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But you keep me around because you need my capabilities, shereen. And I can offer you more..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “但你需要我的能力，因此你一直把我留在身边，亲爱的。我能提供的东西，远远不止于此……”
languages.original_text: "But you keep me around because you need my capabilities, shereen. And I can offer you more..."

traits.locale_text: “但你需要我的能力，因此你一直把我留在身边，亲爱的。我能提供的东西，远远不止于此……”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Pero me mantiene a su lado porque necesita mis habilidades, shereen. Y puedo ofrecerle más...».
languages.original_text: "But you keep me around because you need my capabilities, shereen. And I can offer you more..."

traits.locale_text: «Pero me mantiene a su lado porque necesita mis habilidades, shereen. Y puedo ofrecerle más...».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「でも、あたしを近くに置いてるってことは、あたしの力が必要なんでしょう、シャリーン。それに、あたしができることはまだあるのよ…」
languages.original_text: "But you keep me around because you need my capabilities, shereen. And I can offer you more..."

traits.locale_text: 「でも、あたしを近くに置いてるってことは、あたしの力が必要なんでしょう、シャリーン。それに、あたしができることはまだあるのよ…」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Peut-être, mais vous me gardez à vos côtés parce que vous avez besoin de mes talents, shereen. Et vous n'avez encore rien vu... »
languages.original_text: "But you keep me around because you need my capabilities, shereen. And I can offer you more..."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être, mais vous me gardez à vos côtés parce que vous avez besoin de mes talents, shereen. Et vous n'avez encore rien vu... »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Aber Ihr behaltet mich bei Euch, weil Ihr meine Fähigkeiten braucht, Shereen. Und ich habe noch mehr anzubieten ..."
languages.original_text: "But you keep me around because you need my capabilities, shereen. And I can offer you more..."

traits.locale_text: "Aber Ihr behaltet mich bei Euch, weil Ihr meine Fähigkeiten braucht, Shereen. Und ich habe noch mehr anzubieten ..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Yine de hünerlerime ihtiyacın olduğu için beni yanında tutuyorsun şirinim. Ayrıca sana daha fazlasını da sunabilirim..."
languages.original_text: "But you keep me around because you need my capabilities, shereen. And I can offer you more..."

traits.locale_text: "Yine de hünerlerime ihtiyacın olduğu için beni yanında tutuyorsun şirinim. Ayrıca sana daha fazlasını da sunabilirim..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
